# largeContentImage

**Instance Property**

An image that represents the view in the large content viewer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var largeContentImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

To present content in the large content viewer, you can provide either [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/largeContentTitle] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/largeContentImage], or both.

This property defaults to an appropriate value for UIKit classes; otherwise, it’s `nil`.

## Modifying the accessibility behavior

- **accessibilityIgnoresInvertColors**: A Boolean value indicating whether the view ignores an accessibility request to invert its colors.
- **largeContentImageInsets**: Insets to adjust the position of the view’s image so it appears centered in the large content viewer.
- **largeContentTitle**: A string that describes the view in the large content viewer.
- **scalesLargeContentImage**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the large content viewer scales the item’s image to a larger size.
- **showsLargeContentViewer**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to show the view in the large content viewer.
